meanings.definition: Marked with spots or blotches of different colors.
meanings.sent1: The cat had a mottled fur coat.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a mottled sky at sunset.
meanings.sent3: The mottled cake looked like a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent4: Her mottled scarf added a touch of whimsy to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The mottled leaves on the tree created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: To mark with spots or blotches.
meanings.sent1: She mottled the paper with different paint colors.
meanings.sent2: The rain mottled the sidewalk with puddles.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally mottled his shirt with ink while writing.
meanings.sent4: The artist mottled the canvas with bold strokes.
meanings.sent5: The chef mottled the cake with swirls of frosting.
